ComicInfo.Title: I Die Too Often; The Vandals!; Casper's Boss!; They Don't Complain; Red as a Lobster
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Die Too Often: A convicted killer has a repeating dream of dying in the electric chair. Finally, the event is real and he is relieved the dreams have stopped in the peace of death...until he hears the warden summon his ghost from its grave and back through the green door. He realizes that he is damned to an eternity of executions.
The Vandals!: When four vandals enter a museum at night to cut off the gold heads from a hydra idol, they end with their heads placed upon the evil idol.
Casper's Boss!: When his smoker boss doesn't lend him the money he needs for his wife's operation and she dies, a man ties the smoker up in a shed filled with explosives.
They Don't Complain: This story postulates that dead people remain aware and sensate during their autopsies.
Red as a Lobster: Lobsters get their revenge on a diver who likes to boil them alive in order to observe their suffering by herding him into a hot-spring.
